---
title: 'lineage'
description: "Print lineage trees for a build"
---

Print lineage trees for all columns in a build. Use this to see how columns are derived and where data comes from.

## Usage

Pass a build target to print lineage trees for all columns.

```bash
xorq lineage <target>
```

## Arguments

The build to inspect.

| Argument | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| `target` | Build target: alias, catalog entry ID, build ID, or path to the build directory |

## Example

Print lineage for a build directory.

```bash
xorq lineage builds/f02d28198715
```
